Event_Description: OPEC decides not to cut production - begins price war
Brent reaches multi-year low after 2014-2015 glut
First OPEC+ production cut agreement (~1.8 mb/d)
US withdraws from Iran nuclear deal + reimposes sanctions
Russia-Saudi Arabia oil price war begins
COVID-19 demand collapse + storage crisis (WTI briefly negative)
Russia invades Ukraine → supply fears + initial sanctions
Peak Brent ~$133-139 after invasion + intensified sanctions
US-China trade war impacts demand expectations
